meanings.definition: A container for holding a fire, typically used for heating or cooking.
meanings.sent1: The firepot kept us warm during the camping trip.
meanings.sent2: Mom cooked dinner in the firepot over the campfire.
meanings.sent3: The firepot seemed to dance with the flames as we roasted marshmallows.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for cooking was like a blazing firepot in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The firepot glowed brightly in the darkness of the night.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is very energetic or passionate.
meanings.sent1: The little boy was a firepot of energy, always running around.
meanings.sent2: She was a firepot of creativity, constantly coming up with new ideas.
meanings.sent3: The team captain was a firepot of motivation, always inspiring his teammates.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the project was like a burning firepot that ignited the whole team.
meanings.sent5: His fiery personality made him a firepot of excitement in any room.
